name: Gravity Runner (itch) (Roflvslol)
description:
You are a Runner. Your goal is to finish the level as fast as possible. On your way you have to use your abilities purposefully. You have three abilities: You can jump, teleport and reverse gravity. Each of these abilities have a cooldown. To get to your destination efficiently, you should use them selectively. 

On your way to the goal there are obstacles that will destroy you immediately, restarting the level, so you only have one chance.
